summary: Update the TypeScript SDK and samples to support Node.js versions 18.x through 22.x and TypeScript 5.x to align with current platform and language standards.
userImpact: Users on newer Node.js versions (18.x-22.x) need explicit SDK support to ensure compatibility and access to latest language features.
proposedFix: Update SDK dependencies and samples to support Node 18.x through 22.x with TypeScript 5.x
resolutionDetails: Resolved by PR #1586 which implemented the Node version range updates
keyQuote: Update both SDK and samples repos to Node v18..v22, and TypeScript 5.x.
